Yeah, Serizawa Kamo's site mentions Yoshimura Kanichiro and yes he was
a kenjutsu teacher in the Shinsengumi AND I did find some book on him
at amazon.co.jp

> Scans are from An Illustrated Guide to the Shinsengumi

the Shinsengumi by that name.
